Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.managers.SettingsManager
public class SettingsManager extends Object
Manages game settings including key bindings, audio, and other preferences. Settings are persisted to a properties file and loaded on startup. Uses singleton pattern to ensure consistent settings across the application.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Phung Yu Jie
